description: This Python script initializes a knowledge base with documents and metadata, sets up a vector database, and performs filtered queries using an agent. It involves downloading sample data, configuring a vector database, and executing asynchronous operations for loading data and querying.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A class representing a LanceDB vector database, used for storing and querying vector data.

classes.name: JSONKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class representing a knowledge base that loads JSON documents and associated metadata.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class that facilitates querying the knowledge base with filters and generating responses.

methods.name: download_knowledge_filters_sample_data
methods.description: Downloads sample JSON data files for knowledge filtering tests.

methods.name: aload
methods.description: Loads data into the knowledge base, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: aprint_response
methods.description: Generates a response based on a query with optional knowledge filters and markdown formatting.
